著作権使用料: (ちょさくけんしようりょう) - royalties

著作権保護期間: (ちょさくけんほごきかん) - copyright protection period
著作権図書館: (ちょさくけんとしょかん) - copyright library
著作権所有者: (ちょさくけんしょゆうしゃ) - copyright holder
著作権法: (ちょさくけんほう) - (Japanese) Copyright Act
著作権登録図書館: (ちょさくけんとうろくとしょかん) - copyright library
著作物: (ちょさくぶつ) - written thing (e.g. book, musical composition); works
著作目録: (ちょさくもくろく) - bibliographical catalogue; author bibliography
著作者人格権: (ちょさくしゃじんかくけん) - author's personal rights; moral rights
著名人: (ちょめいじん) - celebrity; personality; prominent figure
著書名: (ちょしょめい) - title of a book; title of a literary work
著者: (chosha) - author (uso de um determinado livro), writer
著聞: (ちょもん) - something well-known throughout the world
著莪: (シャガ) - fringed iris (Iris japonica); Japanese iris
著述業: (ちょじゅつぎょう) - the writing profession
葛: (katsu/kuzu) - arrowroot , kudzu (Pueraria montana), Japanese arrowroot; Chinese moonseed (Sinomenium acutum)
葛布: (くずふ) - cloth made from kudzu (Japanese arrowroot) fiber (fibre)
葛折: (つづらおり) - (yoji) winding; meandering; sinuous; zigzag
葛折り: (つづらおり) - (yoji) winding; meandering; sinuous; zigzag
葛掛け: (くずかけ) - food dressed with liquid starch

葛藤科: (つづらふじか) - Menispermaceae; moonseed family of plants
葛饅頭: (くずまんじゅう) - ball of bean paste covered with a kudzu starch glaze

葡萄糖: (ぶどうとう) - grape sugar; glucose; dextrose

葡萄豆: (ぶどうまめ) - black soybean; soybeans boiled in sugary water; pea

葦の髄から天井を覗く: (よしのずいからてんじょうをのぞく) - to have a narrow view of things; to look at the ceiling through a reed
葦切: (ヨシキリ) - reed warbler (esp. the great reed warbler, but also the black-browed reed warbler)
葦切鮫: (ヨシキリザメ) - blue shark (Prionace glauca, species of circumglobal requiem shark)

葦原中国: (あしはらのなかつくに) - Japan; name of Japan in Japanese mythology

葦手: (あしで) - painting representing reeds around water with rocks, grass or birds made using characters (Heian period); characters written in a way inspired from that style
葦雀: (ヨシキリ) - reed warbler (esp. the great reed warbler, but also the black-browed reed warbler)
葦鹿: (アシカ) - eared seal (esp. the California sea lion, Zalophus californianus); sea lion
葩餅: (はなびらもち) - sweet burdock and miso-bean paste covered with a thin layer of mochi
